description: This Java class serves as a centralized exception handler for a Spring Boot application, providing consistent JSON error responses for various types of exceptions.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A controller advice class that handles different exceptions globally across the application, returning standardized error responses.

methods.name: baseError
methods.description: Creates a standardized error body with timestamp, status, error message, and additional message.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException by returning a 404 response with a JSON body.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation exceptions, returning a 400 response with details about field errors.

methods.name: handleBadRequest
methods.description: Handles multiple bad request related exceptions, returning a 400 response.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning a 500 internal server error response.
